item.title: UCL updates: Arsenal level with Bayern; Madrid, Liverpool, PSG also in action
Is it time for McLaren to prioritize Norris over Piastri?
item.description: McLaren has refused to favor one driver over the other all season, but as Max Verstappen closes in, should the Papaya outfit issue team orders?

item.title: Source: Angels in talks to buy out Rendon deal
item.description: The Angels and Anthony Rendon are in talks about buying out the final year of his seven-year, $245M contract, a source told ESPN. The third baseman is...

item.title: Shedeur 'not comfortable,' wants to remain QB1
item.description: Shedeur Sanders said he is "not comfortable" as he prepares for his second start against the 49ers.
